IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Communications-Based Train Control (CBTC) System Design and Functional Allocations
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1474.3/D12.0, Mar 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The purpose of this recommended practice is to define a preferred CBTC system design/system architecture to achieve the CBTC performance and functional requirements of IEEE Std. 1474.1-2004, and to allocate functions to the major CBTC subsystems.
